name: streamr-client-webpack-example
description: Example of how streamr-client can be included in webpack projects

scripts.build-with-parent: cp -Rpfv ../../dist ./node_modules/streamr-client/ && rm node_modules/streamr-client/package.json; cp ../../package.json ./node_modules/streamr-client/package.json && npm run build

author: Streamr
#: Update core-js -> 3.6.2, after releasing new version of client
